task.title: Remove/Reset Reveal.js defaults
task.shortdesc: This topic describes how to override Reveal.js default formats that you don't want applied to your slides.

step.cmd: Choose one or more methods to reset defaults:
step.choices:
Write new CSS code Create an id tag by adding the pound symbol before a name For example, #TitleSlide Add CSS code for the desired effect to this id tag For example, to center the text, {text-align: center} In your HTML file, create a div with this id
Every div in the HTML file with this id, will be centered.</!--> Delete resets for a specific element Find reset classes under the "reset styles" comment Delete class for the element you want to change</!--> Modify CSS for .reveal and .slides classes Find the .reveal and .slides classes. Change the attribute you want in a different format. </!-->
